channel.title: Hey there Need help where to put cache on a linux OS?
channel.description:
Hey there Moparscape,
I need help so i can play and help my player's who are playing on linux, Where do I put the cache file of the webclient/client.
I am using ubuntu 11.04
Thank you if anyone can help!
